--- title: "S. Bertilla Boscardin - Festa Dell'Accoglienza" date: "1997" author: "Adrian Joseph" image: https://storage.googleapis.com/blogs_josa/sport/1997_BOSCARDIN_FESTA_DELL_ACCOGLIENZA/img/01.png categories: [race report, random race] format: html lightbox: match: auto effect: fade desc-position: right loop: false --- ![](https://storage.googleapis.com/blogs_josa/sport/1997_BOSCARDIN_FESTA_DELL_ACCOGLIENZA/img/01.png) This was an assortment of random events organized for every fresh(wo)man of my high-school. I do not recall much, only that I won. If I won overall, or some category only (or if there were categories in the first place), I do not know. I was probably too busy looking at a red head that got my attention, hoping she ended up in my class. Spoiler alert, she did, and we also dated for a while, and that was a much better achievement. ::: {.cell} ::: ## Summary ```{=html}
Position overall: 1
